name: Press vest
description:
An instrument that the press should not use, but unfortunately it is necessary to carry out its work so that society has information on what is happening in different countries: from abuses, authoritarian governments, corruption and coverage of serious human rights violations. human and environmental.
The organization Reporters Without Borders points out that in 2022 so far there are 45 journalists murdered in the world. In his name and as an act of memory we made this accessory in the NFT ice creams.
